sys_metadata_link.payload:
1970-01-01 00:05:00 In bowl,add instant coffee,water and mix well.

In blender,add sugar,dissolves coffee,milk,cream,ice cubes and blend until smooth.

Add ice cream and blitz for 1-2 times.

In serving glass,add ice cubes,pour prepared cold coffee,add ice cream scoop and drizzle chocolate syrup & serve.

]]> true 33c8d0072f7215102d2c2ca62799b61c
  • Servings:
  • Prep time: 5 Minutes
  • Cook time: 5 Minutes
  • Total time: 10 Minutes
    • ]]>     Instant coffee 2 tbs

    Water 2 tbs

    Sugar 2 tbs or to taste

    Milk chilled 2 Cups

    Cream 2 tbs (optional)

    Ice cubes

    Ice cream 2 scoops
